channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Autonomous tech is coming to farming. What will it mean for crops and workers who harvest them?
item.description: Autonomous tech is coming to farming. From self-driving tractors to fruit-picking robots, a growing number of technology companies are bringing automation to agriculture.

item.title: Republicans seek votes among the Amish, who rarely cast them, in swing-state Pennsylvania
item.description: The Amish are numerous in the all-important swing state of Pennsylvania, and yet only a small minority of them vote in elections.

item.title: In their own words: What it’s like in a ‘chaos’ Congress and why these lawmakers keep coming back
item.description: Polarizing. Challenging. A lot of wasted time. That’s how lawmakers describe what it is like being in the U.S. House these days.
